title: Personal Website
description: My personal portofolio website, written in React using Tailwind CSS.

title: JagTrucks
description: A basic proof-of-concept website for allowing students at the TAMU-SA campus to more easily find which food trucks are on campus on a given day, and more.

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: A basic web application allowing a user to view various common sorting algorithms in use.
